Gina Knight is responsible for managing hyperWALLETâ€™s corporate accounting, treasury and internal control systems across the entire organization.

She has over 15 years of international business experience and has held senior level positions in treasury, operations and bank management.

Most recently Gina served as COO for a technology start-up firm specializing in information solutions and services for mobile devices. Her previous experience also includes co-founding one of the first foreign-owned banks in Russia where she served as Chairman for six years.

Gina received an MBA from the Thunderbird School of Global Management and holds a Certified Treasury Professional (CTP) designation with Mastery in Canadian Treasury.
